item.title: Dicount Kissing Booth for the Tall
item.description: I give all the #TallGirls a special discount at my kissing booth on Valentine's day.

item.title: Fat
item.description: A rebuttle to a complaint that our comic - addressing the issue of big and tall stores using their name as a euphemism, at the expense and injustice of the tall - is insensitive
